classitems.description: File which we want to include.
classitems.name: file

classitems.description: Checks if this instance is running as a server.
classitems.name: isServer

classitems.description: Checks if this instance is running as a client.
classitems.name: isClient

classitems.description: Regular expression pattern for matching slaveclient name
classitems.name: regexp

classitems.description: Use regular expression to match for the slaveclients name.
classitems.name: username.match

classitems.description: Clears duplicates from scene if Script is reloaded
classitems.name: clearScene

params.name: AttributeChange=Default
params.description: Enumeration of attribute/component change types for replication. (2=LocalOnly, 3=Replicate)

return.description: Return true if entity has been found and removed.

classitems.description: Sets and shows Info widget default values.
classitems.name: showInfoWidgetDefaultValues

classitems.description: Create local entity with listed components.
classitems.name: scene.CreateLocalEntity

params.name: param
params.description: Mesh material file name and path

classitems.description: Parents this entity to another entity.
classitems.name: entity.placeable.SetParent

params.name: preserveWorldTransform=false
params.description: When false, the transform attribute of this placeable is treated as the new local

classitems.description: Send new parent entity reference value to all slave clients if user changes that.
classitems.name: ParentEntityRefChanged

classitems.description: Represents an executable command on entity.
classitems.name: entity.Exec

params.name: ExecType
params.description: Execution type of the action, i.e. where the actions are executed. 1=local, 2=server. 4=peers, 5=local+peers...

params.name: p1
params.description: 1st parameter for the action, if applicable. Emitted when the action is triggered

params.name: p2
params.description: 2nd parameter for the action, if applicable. Emitted when the action is triggered

params.name: p3
params.description: 3rd parameter for the action, if applicable. Emitted when the action is triggered

params.name: rest
params.description: Rest of the parameters, if applicable

classitems.description: Create Info widgets and layout for them.
classitems.name: setInfoWidgetLayout

classitems.description: Sets the layout manager for mainWidget.
classitems.name: mainWidget.setLayout

classitems.description: Sets both the minimum and maximum width of mainWidget.
classitems.name: mainWidget.setFixedWidth

classitems.description: Adds the given widget to the cell grid at row, column. The top-left position is (0, 0) by default.
classitems.name: layout.addWidget

classitems.description: Sets the left, top, right, and bottom margins to use around the layout.
classitems.name: layout.setContentsMargins

classitems.description: Sets spacing between widgets inside the layout.
classitems.name: layout.setSpacing

classitems.description: This property holds the scene rectangle; the bounding rectangle of the scene.
classitems.name: ui.GraphicsScene().sceneRect

return.description: Rectangle in the plane using floating point precision

classitems.description: Creates a proxy widget for the widget and adds it to the main graphics scene.

classitems.name: mainWidget.setWindowOpacity

classitems.description: Adds proxy widget to the scene
classitems.name: ui.AddProxyWidgetToScene

classitems.description: Resize black block sizes on screen edges
classitems.name: LetterBox

classitems.name: QGraphicsPolygonItem.setBrush

classitems.name: MoveCameras

classitems.description: Set new x coordinate point of InfoWidget if window size resized.
classitems.name: windowResized

classitems.description: Emitted when it is time for client code to update their applications.
classitems.name: Update

params.name: frametime
params.description: Elapsed time in seconds since the last frame

classitems.description: Begin profiling a piece of code.
classitems.name: profiler.BeginBlock

classitems.description: Returns the orientation of entity's transform.
classitems.name: entity.placeable.Orientation

params.name: MovementModifier.motion
params.description: MovementModifier.motion vector multiplied by quaternion of itself

classitems.description: Sets the position of entity's transform.

params.name: name
params.description: Sets the name of this InputContext

classitems.description: Set to true to receive mouse input events even when the mouse cursor is over a Qt widget.
classitems.name: inputContext.takeMouseEventsOverQt

classitems.description: Round a number upward to it's nearest integer.
classitems.name: Math.ceil

classitems.description: Round a number downward  to it's nearest integer.
classitems.name: Math.floor

classitems.description: Rotates QPixmap object around its center.
classitems.name: QPixmap.setRotation

classitems.description: Handler for key release commands (stop movement)

classitems.description: Handler for mouse x axis relative movement (rotate camera)

params.name: AttributeChange=Default
params.description: Enumeration of attribute/component change types for replication. (2=LocalOnly, 3=Replicate)

params.name: replicated=true
params.description: Whether entity is replicated to server and other clients

params.name: componentsReplicated=true
params.description: Whether components will be replicated to server and other clients

classitems.description: Sets Void-entity's temporary value to true
classitems.name: voidEntity.SetTemporary

params.name: AttributeChange=Default
params.description: Enumeration of attribute/component change types for replication. (2=LocalOnly, 3=Replicate)
